commit message: Closing notification when app is removed from recent task list.
Let tap on notification open app again.
Added current URL to notification. In case Activity is not active anymore, at least the URL of the last video is opened again.
Reverted commit 0e5fb8 since it did not work. Android does not call Activity.onDestroy() when app is removed from recent tasks list.
